data.title: Modern hotel in Vitacura, Chile
data.meta_description: Pullman Santiago Vitacura is a comfortable hotel with swimming pool, close to bars, restaurants and shopping. Book your stay.
data.text:
Pullman Santiago Vitacura

Hotels combining lifestyle and design, for business and leisure

The remodeled Hotel Pullman Santiago Vitacura is fabulously located in one of the most sophisticated areas of the Chilean capital, close to Bicentennial Park, shopping malls, art galleries, bars, and restaurants. With incredible views of the mountain range, Pullman Vitacura has a fitness center, terraces, an outdoor pool, covered parking, free WIFI in all common areas, and more.

On one of Santiago's main streets, Vitacura Avenue, the hotel near financial centers, also has easy access to Santiago's tourist spots. When staying at our hotel, you will be a 10-minute drive from the Apumanque commercial center, with shops and restaurants. Visit the Hard Rock Caf√© Santiago, which is just a 7-minute drive away. Remember the regional parks, like Bicentennial Park and Araucano Park.

There are many things to do in Santiago, especially cultural visits. Get to know the Museum of Memory & the historic center of Santiago to immerse yourself in the history of the charming Chilean capital.

"The best way to recharge is to enjoy unforgettable moments. Welcome to a luxurious experience within the cosmopolitan spirit in the city of Santiago"

Daniel PIZARRO, Hotel Manager

Dear Fabio, We appreciate the time you have taken to answer our satisfaction survey and your valuable comments. We are very sorry you did not received the service you are used to receive at Pullman hotel's. We will share this information with our team, so we can improve our guest's experience. We hope to host you again and offer you a stay that exceeds your expectations. Receive our warmest greetings. Sincerely, Rebeca Lara Customer Service PULLMAN SANTIAGO VITACURA

Dear Francisco, We appreciate the time you have taken to answer our satisfaction survey. We are very sorry you had a bad family experience at our hotel. We completely understand your discomfort because your family could not stay at connected rooms. Unfortunately, we cannot warranty our guests connected rooms until the moment they Check In at our hotel, specially in high season. We apprecciate your understanding and we hope to host you again and offer you a stay that exceeds your expectations. Receive our warmest greetings. Sincerely, Rebeca Lara Customer Service PULLMAN SANTIAGO VITACURA

In general, it was good. Many of their staffs are friendly and kind. However, some of them are not well trained, particularly at the reception. When checking in, we waited for a while, because group tour people were checking in just before us. So, it was understandable, but after this long waiting time, they never mention to this. In most cases of other hotels, like Marriot group or IHG groups, they will give some words regarding such a wating time. Besides, they didn't give any information regarding the fundamental services of the hotel, e.g. lift location, restaurant location and service hours, breakfast location and avaiable time, etc. Even when checking out, they didn't try to even ask whether I need an invoice or not, until I requested them to issue. During the stay, there is a day that they didn't clean up my room although I left my room befor 11am by hanging "make up request tag" on the door and came back after 4pm. Other than these, many of staffs are nice and give us a good quality of services. The point is the quality of their service depends on staffs. This is what I hope they improve.

Dear Matt. We appreciate the time you have taken to answer our satisfaction survey. We are truly sorry you did not have a good experience during your stay at our hotel, because of the service our staff offered you. We will share you valuable feedback with all our team so we can improve the training of our staff and the service they offer to our guest's. We offer you our deepest apologies again, and aprecciate your comments. Receive our warmest greetings. Sincerely, Rebeca Lara Welcomer PULLMAN SANTIAGO VITACURA
